physical_examinations.relevant_findings: The patient presented with innumerable pink-tan colored papules on his face, neck, upper portion of the chest, and upper portion of the back.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Lesions had developed almost 20 years ago but had been rapidly increasing in number and severity over the past 3 years. Visible improvement was noted within the first month of therapy, with a smaller number of yellowish papules and significant flattening of the lesions. Further improvement was observed after the dosage increase.
